Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key2: She should know how to manage a group of students.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key3: Take a class for students who need help with a particular topic.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key4: The class format should be very easy accompanied by a lot of real-life examples.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key5: Classes should be taken weekly and on time.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key6: Resolves students' doubts and gives them some smart study tips.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key7: Checks whether the student is progressing or not.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key8: She should be an active listener, a source of motivation.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key9: Asks questions to students and examines whether they are able to answer or not.
Who_is_a_Good_Coach?_key10: She should give constructive feedback to the students.
